html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-14932012-11-07,  ,  ,  DFAIT, 
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
SubjectGovernment of Canada and the European Space Agency ** European Programme for Life and Physical Sciences and Applications in Space **
PrecisOrder authorizing the Minister of Foreign Affairs to sign, or to delegate authority to sign, on behalf of the Government of Canada, with the effect of BRINGING INTO FORCE, the Arrangement between the Government of Canada and the European Space Agency concerning the Participation by the Government of Canada in the EUROPEAN PROGRAMME FOR LIFE AND PHYSICAL SCIENCES AND APPLICATIONS IN SPACE, thereby formalizing Canada's participation in the said program, consistent with Article III of the COOPERATION AGREEMENT between the Government of Canada and the EUROPEAN SPACE AGENCY.
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Government of Canada and the European Space Agency ** European Programme for Life and Physical Sciences and Applications in Space **
precis: Order authorizing the Minister of Foreign Affairs to sign, or to delegate authority to sign, on behalf of the Government of Canada, with the effect of BRINGING INTO FORCE, the Arrangement between the Government of Canada and the European Space Agency concerning the Participation by the Government of Canada in the EUROPEAN PROGRAMME FOR LIFE AND PHYSICAL SCIENCES AND APPLICATIONS IN SPACE, thereby formalizing Canada's participation in the said program, consistent with Article III of the COOPERATION AGREEMENT between the Government of Canada and the EUROPEAN SPACE AGENCY.
